column5: The Dundee location will be closed until further notice because of an electrical fire. I was just wondering if any of you who live not too far away from there could benefit from a fire sale or something of the sort.
Thanks, I wish I was, Roy could I do some damage to my wallet there.
Winnipegs new Cabelas opens on May 9th, it is in the southern end of the city and is almost double the current size store
Winnipeg is the center of Canada...what can I say...

I did my first online order with them out west. I went snails mail,and had my new boots in 6 days. Also to add,,the boots were on sale last week,and they gave me the 20 buck savings back,no questions asked. Thats service.
I have also found them to provide outstanding customer service, glad u saved 20 bucks.

Thanks for the heads up Roy. That particular store was hit by a tornado a couple of years back as well. I'll be heading there in August. Probably back up and running long before then. I can't see them staying closed for long.
I'll be golfing near there in 3 weeks - hopefully there'll be a chance to pick up some more stuff there (to add to my collection in the garage...)

Man that location hasn't had the best of luck. First hit by a tornado a couple years ago and now burnt by fire.  maybe that's why I cant catch any fish with the gear I buy from there..... its jinxed !! lol
I love that store I would detour up there just to walk around and look at the fish tanks way better then any BPS.
I agree with Mike  Cabelas rocks!!!!
